title: 2025 Lamar Cardinals baseball team
data:
The 2025 Lamar Cardinals baseball team represents Lamar University during the 2025 NCAA Division I baseball season as members of the Southland Conference. The Cardinals play their home games at Vincent–Beck Stadium located on the university campus in Beaumont, Texas. The Cardinals are led by ninth–year head coach Will Davis. The Southland Conference Coaches Poll was released on February 6, 2025. Lamar was picked to finish first in the Southland Conference with 197 overall votes and 18 first place votes.[2] Zak Skinner, Brayden Evans, and Kyle Moseley were named to the conference preseason first team.  Matt Ryan was named to the conference preseason second team.
[2] *-2024 Southland All-Conference Selection
+-Tie for final spot *-2024 Southland All-Conference Selection
